product_name: Pearl Izumi ELITE Barrier Convertible Bike Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: When your rides take you from cold mornings to warm afternoons, just zip the sleeves off the Pearl Izumi ELITE Barrier women's convertible bike jacket to keep your comfort level just right. Sleeves stow in rear zippered pocket; 2 handwarmer pockets and 1 chest pocket keep cycling essentials easily accessible. Lightweight fabric is wind- and water-resistant while remaining breathable; soft micromesh inner collar adds warmth and helps manage moisture for comfort. Back cape vent promotes breathability; full-length zipper helps you regulate body temperature; internal draft flap keeps wind out and warmth in. Semifitted design prevents fabric from flapping in slipstream. Pearl Izumi ELITE Barrier convertible bike jacket features reflective accents for increased visibility in low light. Closeout.
